channel.title: Comments on: SQL Friday, The Best SQL Server Links Of The Past Week Episode 1
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Brent Ozar
item.dc:creator: Brent Ozar
item.description: Glad you're doing it on Fridays too - I like having good links to read when my brain's coasting into neutral on Fridays. And thanks for the mention!
item.content:encoded: Glad you’re doing it on Fridays too – I like having good links to read when my brain’s coasting into neutral on Fridays. And thanks for the mention!

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: In general people don't link to their own post unless they do a "top 10 post of the year by views" or something like that
item.content:encoded: In general people don’t link to their own post unless they do a “top 10 post of the year by views” or something like that

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: We do not have any useful links on LTD?
item.content:encoded: We do not have any useful links on LTD?
